prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Essays by Walt Whitman, Accession #9778, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library by Tracy W. McGregor on 1972 January 26.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains five essays by Whitman: Abraham Lincoln, 1865; Homer and Shakespeare, 1857; On Samuel Johnson, 1857; On Shakespeare and Ben Jonson, 1850; and Shakespeare and his sonnets and Edmund Spenser, 1850. Also included are notes on the Dutch and English traits in his personality, and on his method of composing Leaves of Grass.
